Title: Hybrid Mobile Developer for a Product Based Company
Description:
Roles and responsibilities:
Cross-platform mobile app developers who have developed mobile apps with a familiarity of Ionic/Flutter
Develop and Manage Mobile Application in Hybrid - Android / iOS Platform
Mobile app architecture planning
Mobile app design and optimization, able to provide a solution to improve mobile app quality, understand emerging technologies, standards and best practices to bring mobile app product to the next level
Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies and frameworks to maximize development efficiency
Estimate timelines and deliver as per schedule
Solid knowledge of mobile app development practices, along with mobile testing tools and techniques
Expertise in optimizing the app for performance
Experience using agile principles and methodologies
Deep understanding of the mobile landscape and behavior patterns is mandatory
Required Skills:
Experience using web services (HTTP, REST, SOAP) using JSON.
Good knowledge of object-oriented design patterns and Multi-threading concepts
Good knowledge of the SQLite database and the Google Play Services like Push Notifications
Strong mobile UI design (multi-screen resolutions), coding, support and maintenance
Knowledge of HTML5, JavaScript, and the third-party API (like Facebook, Twitter, etc.) will be added advantage
Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
Proficient iOS and Android mobile app experience are a plus
Experience:
Minimum 3 years of hands on experience
Write clean, manageable code and maintain proper documentation
Excellent command over Data Structures and Algorithms
Familiarity with continuous integration
Strong problem solving and analytical skills
Knowledge of benchmarking and optimization
Security mindedness in development practices
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design and deliver new features
Ability to work independently in small teams
Responsible and capable of meeting tight deadlines
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: Up to ₹1,500,000.00 per year
Experience:
Hybrid Mobile Tech: 1 year (Preferred)
Andriod or iOS: 1 year (Preferred)

Title: Full Stack (AEM) Web Developer - Channel Marketing Execution
Description:
Position summary:
The Full Stack Web Developer will report to the Technology Manager of Core Digital. You'll be part of a cross-functional team that's responsible for the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment. As a full stack developer, you should be comfortable with both front-end and back-end coding languages, development frameworks and third-party libraries.
Responsibilities
Web UI development
o Build web components and templates for our digital properties through Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) and/or latest HTML framework
o Work from supplied wire frames and functional requirements to build web interfaces using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS, and work with team to integrate with back-end systems.
o Write effective APIs as needed
o Build features and applications with a mobile responsive design
o Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency
o Troubleshoot and resolve cross-browser and cross-platform issues.
o Optimize web sites for maximum speed and scalability
o Manage day-to-day efforts to ensure smooth & efficient delivery to include production updates, code changes, and collaboration on new initiatives
o Collaborate with other developers
o Write technical documentation
o Remain current with the latest digital design trends and tools
o Handle production work, as needed, to meet project deadlines
Collaboration with design, product owner, and content production teams
o Collaborate with teams to ensure design quality and consistency of web pages.
o Validate UI/UX designs for technical feasibility
o Assist with requirements definition, specifications, design, development and timelines for key initiatives
Recommended Qualifications
Strong foundation in web development
HTML5 (required)
CSS3 (required) and CSS pre-processors (Less preferred)
JavaScript (JQuery preferred)
Asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
Experience with modern web frameworks (Bootstrap preferred; Node.js/React a plus)
Solid understanding of responsive design
Experience with Java and Maven
Experience with web site optimization
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them
Knowledge of optimizing graphics for different platforms
Good understanding of SEO principles
Experience adhering to ADA WCAG 2.0 AA standards (preferred)
Experience with Content Management Systems - Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) 6.x preferred
HTML Templating Language (HTL) and Sightly
Component development
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools (Git, BitBucket preferred)
Proven success working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment
Ability to manage multiple, on-going timelines, as well as ad-hoc "rush" requests
Ability to organize and prioritize workload
Flexibility to adapt to changing design requirements
Outstanding attention to detail
Strong communication and presentation skills with audiences across all levels
Degree in Computer Science or related fieldJPMorgan Chase & Co., one of the oldest financial institutions, offers innovative financial solutions to millions of consumers, small businesses and many of the world's most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under the J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Our history spans over 200 years and today we are a leader in investment banking, consumer and small business banking, commercial banking, financial transaction processing and asset management.
We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and place a high value on diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. In accordance with applicable law, we make reasonable accommodations for applicants' and employees' religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs.

Title: Associate Software Engineer
Description:
Roles and Responsibilities
Introduction
As an Associate Software Engineer, you will lead Dec6 into the future by translating system requirements into the design and development of customized systems in an agile environment. The success of Dec6 is underpinned by its resources who would transform vital business needs into code and drive innovation. Your work will power Dec6 and its clients globally, collaborating and integrating code into enterprise systems. You will have access to the latest education, tools and technology, and a limitless career path with the world’s technology leader. Come to Dec6 and make a global impact!
As an Associate Software Engineer, your day in the role will include…
Development, implementation and providing solutions to the given problem in all the Web technologies
Build together end to end application starting from front end web development, back end development, middleware integration and persisting data in no SQL or DBMS database
Strong into trends and directions of the Industry, marketplace and the players
Provide objective guidance without personal or political considerations
You will come with…
Sound knowledge in OOP concepts well. Should be proficient in exception handling , collections, Abstract Classes and Interfaces, Constructors, File IO and Serialization, Collections (List, Map, Set), Access Specifiers, Exceptions (Checked, Unchecked), Generics, Java Keywords (Static, Final, Volatile, Synchronized, Transient), JVM and Memory Management, Multithreading and Synchronization, JSP/ Servlets,JMS . Should be skilled in one of the IDEs like Eclipse , IntelliJ. Should be conversant with Build tools like Ant , Maven.
Working knowledge in HTML 5 , CSS3, Angular JS, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, REST API, JUnit, React
How we’ll help you grow:
You’ll have access to all the technical and management training material that will help you
You’ll learn directly from guide developers in the field; our team leads love to mentor
You have the opportunity to work in many different areas to identify what really excites you
Required Technical and Professional Expertise
Java 8 , JEE, Spring Core, Spring Boot, Spring MVC, REST , Hibernate, Angular JS , Node JS, CSS3 , HTML5, Any RDBMS database (DB2, Postgre, MYSQL, Oracle etc.) and Sql knowledge , Git , Maven, Eclipse / Intellij, Design Patterns
Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise
AWS, GCP, or any cloud based development
Please drop in your CV at our Facebook, Instagram or Linkedin page.
Contract length: 6 months
Expected Start Date: 26/10/2020
Job Types: Contract, Fresher
Salary: ₹10,000.00 - ₹20,000.00 per month
Schedule:
Monday to Friday
Morning shift
Supplemental Pay:
Performance bonus
Experience:
Web Development: 1 year (Preferred)
Mobile App Development: 1 year (Preferred)
total work: 1 year (Preferred)
Education:
Secondary(10th Pass) (Preferred)
Work Remotely:
Yes

Title: Web Developer
Description:
Job Summary
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming.
NCPL provides its web-based technology platform Parity One to institutional asset managers and investment research providers.Own the product delivery by managing a team of developers and testing resources while contributing to the product development personally. This involves understanding the product requirements from the Business Analysts and ensuring they are delivered on time with utmost quality
Brief about the role:
Should have Strong work experience in the scripting language – PHP from both UI and Server perspective.
Good work experience in UI designing programming – HTML and CSS.
Should have Good experience in SQL Server and strong knowledge on SQL and PL/SQL.
Hands-on experience with designing databases and developing large scale web applications on top of them.
Hands-on experience with Node Frameworks (viz Express)/PHP Frameworks (viz Laravel, CodeIgniter).
Experience on front-end technologies, such as HTML5, CSS3 and jQuery.
Develop and optimize front-end UI to ensure applications are rendered consistently in cross-platform environments. Proven experience on developing web applications that have integrations with third party applications.
Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code.
Solid understanding of security/access control, scalability, high availability, and concurrency patterns.
Implementing security and data protection.
Hands-on working experience on Unit Testing frameworks for projects on a day-to-day basis.
Daily working experience on Source Control Management tools like Git (including merging, branching and resolving merge conflicts) and Project Management tools like Jira is a MUST.
Experience working in an Agile environment and participate in peer code reviews.
Flexibility and creativity in solution design - including leveraging emerging technologies such as micro-services, containers etc
Ability to contribute to multiple projects/tasks simultaneously.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
QUALIFICATIONS AND SKILLS:
Must be proficient/expert in CSS and JavaScript
Proven working experience in front-end development
Top-notch programming skills and in-depth knowledge of modern HTML/CSS/JavaScript
A solid understanding of how web applications work including security, session management, and best development practices
Aggressive problem diagnosis and creative problem-solving skills
Strong organizational skills to juggle multiple tasks within the constraints of timelines and budgets with business acumen
Ability to work and thrive in a fast-paced environment, learn rapidly, and master diverse web technologies and techniques.

Title: Front End Developer
Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
Responsibilities
Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Skills And Qualifications
Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery
Note: Every front-end developer is expected to have proficient knowledge of JavaScript, while most front-end developers should know jQuery.
Good understanding of HTML, CSS, Javascript and React
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as Figma or Photoshop is a plus.
Note: A UI/UX designer is expected to deliver finished resources for the developer to incorporate into the app. However, quite often a front-end a web developer needs to make some small adjustments.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that the application will adhere to them.
Expected Start Date: 1/11/2020
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹240,000.00 - ₹480,000.00 per year
Experience:
javascript: 1 year (Required)

Title: Python Developer (django)
Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a highly skilled computer programmer who is comfortable with both front and back end programming. Full Stack Developers are responsible for developing and designing front end web architecture, ensuring the responsiveness of applications and working alongside graphic designers for web design features, among other duties.
*
Full Stack Developers will be required to see out a project from conception to final product, requiring good organizational skills and attention to detail.
*
*
Duties / Responsibilities
Build a framework for handling large volumes of data.
Scaling API's with lowest response times.
Develop and deploy new features to facilitate related procedures and tools if necessary
Write “clean”, well-designed and documented code
Contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle
Troubleshoot, test and maintain the core product software and databases to ensure strong optimization and functionality
Responsible for maintaining existing applications, including version upkeep, bug fixes, and implementing new features and capabilities.
Involved in designing, implementing, and deploying new in-house applications.
Follow industry best practices
Qualifications
Must have extensive Python development experience
Good python scripting and hands-on experience with Django framework
Experience managing full stack, multi-language, multi-framework software development
Front-End: Good understanding of front-end technologies, such as Object Oriented JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. Should have knowledge of Angular JS, Bootstrap, Express JS, Node JS etc.
Be familiar with an agile development cycle and have experience with Git, Python (fundamentals and skill valued) and Django.
Back-end: Proficient in developing APIs across different platforms of web application servers.
Experience in web server technologies in Django/Python is necessary.
Database: Able to understand RDBMS schema and develop software to access data via SQL queries or DB mapper. Familiarity with SQL/NoSQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB) databases and their declarative query languages
Experience with social media APIs is also recommended.
Experience and/or interest in data science, including but not limited to AI, machine learning, sentiment analysis, topic modeling, and NLP, is recommended.

Title: UX/UI Designer Web Designer Front End Developer
Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a highly skilled computer programmer who is comfortable with both front and back end programming. Full Stack Developers are responsible for developing and designing front end web architecture, ensuring the responsiveness of applications and working alongside graphic designers for web design features, among other duties.
*
Full Stack Developers will be required to see out a project from conception to final product, requiring good organizational skills and attention to detail.
*
*
Duties / Responsibilities
Build a framework for handling large volumes of data.
Scaling API's with lowest response times.
Develop and deploy new features to facilitate related procedures and tools if necessary
Write “clean”, well-designed and documented code
Contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle
Troubleshoot, test and maintain the core product software and databases to ensure strong optimization and functionality
Responsible for maintaining existing applications, including version upkeep, bug fixes, and implementing new features and capabilities.
Involved in designing, implementing, and deploying new in-house applications.
Follow industry best practices
Qualifications
Must have extensive Python development experience
Good python scripting and hands-on experience with Django framework
Experience managing full stack, multi-language, multi-framework software development
Front-End: Good understanding of front-end technologies, such as Object Oriented JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. Should have knowledge of Angular JS, Bootstrap, Express JS, Node JS etc.
Be familiar with an agile development cycle and have experience with Git, Python (fundamentals and skill valued) and Django.
Back-end: Proficient in developing APIs across different platforms of web application servers.
Experience in web server technologies in Django/Python is necessary.
Database: Able to understand RDBMS schema and develop software to access data via SQL queries or DB mapper. Familiarity with SQL/NoSQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB) databases and their declarative query languages
Experience with social media APIs is also recommended.
Experience and/or interest in data science, including but not limited to AI, machine learning, sentiment analysis, topic modeling, and NLP, is recommended.
Experience with textual analysis is also recommended.
Our technology stack includes: Python, AWS, SQL, Javascript, Google Cloud Services, and social media APIs
Strong communication skills, both verbal and written, and the ability to listen effectively

Yes

Title: Web Designer & Developer
Description:
A web designer/developer is responsible for the design, layout and coding of a website. They are involved with the technical and graphical aspects of a website - how the site works and how it looks. They can also be involved with the maintenance and update of an existing site.
Web Developer Job Duties:
Regular exposure to business stakeholders and executive management, as well as the authority and scope to apply your expertise to many interesting technical problems.
Candidates must have a strong understanding of UI, cross-browser compatibility, general web functions and standards.
The position requires constant communication with colleagues.
Experience in planning and delivering software platforms used across multiple products and organizational units.
Deep expertise and hands on experience with Web Applications and programming languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Query and API's.
Deep functional knowledge or hands-on design experience with Web Services (REST, SOAP, etc...) is needed to be successful in this position.
Strong grasp of security principles and how they apply to E-Commerce applications.
Web Developer Skills and Qualifications:
JavaScript, Query, HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3, Web Programming Skills, E-Commerce, Teamwork, Verbal Communication, cross-browser compatibility, Web User Interface Design (UI), Security Principles, Object-Oriented Design, Web Services (REST/SOAP), Multimedia Content Development, API's
Word press and woo commerce

Title: Associate Software Engineer
Description:
Roles and Responsibilities
Introduction
As an Associate Software Engineer, you will lead Dec6 into the future by translating system requirements into the design and development of customized systems in an agile environment. The success of Dec6 is underpinned by its resources who would transform vital business needs into code and drive innovation. Your work will power Dec6 and its clients globally, collaborating and integrating code into enterprise systems. You will have access to the latest education, tools and technology, and a limitless career path with the world’s technology leader. Come to Dec6 and make a global impact!
As an Associate Software Engineer, your day in the role will include…
Development, implementation and providing solutions to the given problem in all the Web technologies
Build together end to end application starting from front end web development, back end development, middleware integration and persisting data in no SQL or DBMS database
Strong into trends and directions of the Industry, marketplace and the players
Provide objective guidance without personal or political considerations
You will come with…
Sound knowledge in OOP concepts well. Should be proficient in exception handling , collections, Abstract Classes and Interfaces, Constructors, File IO and Serialization, Collections (List, Map, Set), Access Specifiers, Exceptions (Checked, Unchecked), Generics, Java Keywords (Static, Final, Volatile, Synchronized, Transient), JVM and Memory Management, Multithreading and Synchronization, JSP/ Servlets,JMS . Should be skilled in one of the IDEs like Eclipse , IntelliJ. Should be conversant with Build tools like Ant , Maven.
Working knowledge in HTML 5 , CSS3, Angular JS, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, REST API, JUnit, React
How we’ll help you grow:
You’ll have access to all the technical and management training material that will help you
You’ll learn directly from guide developers in the field; our team leads love to mentor
You have the opportunity to work in many different areas to identify what really excites you
Required Technical and Professional Expertise
Java 8 , JEE, Spring Core, Spring Boot, Spring MVC, REST , Hibernate, Angular JS , Node JS, CSS3 , HTML5, Any RDBMS database (DB2, Postgre, MYSQL, Oracle etc.) and Sql knowledge , Git , Maven, Eclipse / Intellij, Design Patterns
Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise
AWS, GCP, or any cloud based development
Please drop in your CV at our Facebook, Instagram or Linkedin page.

Expected Start Date: 26/10/2020

Monday to Friday

Performance bonus

Title: Front End Developer
Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
Responsibilities
Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Skills And Qualifications
Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery
Note: Every front-end developer is expected to have proficient knowledge of JavaScript, while most front-end developers should know jQuery.
Good understanding of HTML, CSS, Javascript and React
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as Figma or Photoshop is a plus.
Note: A UI/UX designer is expected to deliver finished resources for the developer to incorporate into the app. However, quite often a front-end a web developer needs to make some small adjustments.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that the application will adhere to them.
Expected Start Date: 1/11/2020
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹240,000.00 - ₹480,000.00 per year
Experience:
javascript: 1 year (Required)

Title: HTML Developer
Description:
About Us:
A team of technology enthusiasts, creative designers, software engineers and marketers who are translating clients Ideas into realities and delivering best results.
Global Vincitore is One Stop Solution for SME’s to larger enterprises, we are committed to deliver quality services which add new dimensions and take your business to the next level in your Industry.
Responsibilities
*Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off to engineering
*Conceptualize original website design ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex roadblocks
*Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and sitemaps to communicate interaction and design ideas
*Present and defend designs and key deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders
*Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices, and standards
Requirements
Excellent knowledge of modern HTML, CSS, and jQuery ( Must Required ).
Good knowledge of animation libraries and techniques, build tools (Gulp, Sass, Less), Photoshop, Illustrator, and XD.
Basic Knowledge of Git, Wordpress, PHP, and popular CMS platforms.
Ability to anticipate possible problems with design mockups.
Experience in finding solutions to major problems between different browsers.
Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user-system interaction.
Ability to work on several projects at the same time.
Up-to-date with the latest Web trends, techniques and technologies.
Required Experience: 2-3 Years.
Required Qualification: B.E in IT or CS/ MCA/ BCA.
Benefits:
5 Days Working.
Friendly Environment.
Flexible Timings.
No Bond.

Title: Website Designer
Description:
Web Developer Requirements:
Bachelor degree in Web development or related field, or relevant experience.
Solid knowledge and experience in programming applications.
Proficient in JavaScript, HTML, CSS.
Proficient in My SQL.
Dedicated team player.
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment.
Solid ability in both written and verbal communication.
Knowledge of programming language and technical terminology.
Able to develop ideas and processes and clearly express them.
High degree of independent judgment.
Able to solve complex problems.
Web Developer Responsibilities:
Website and software application designing, building, or maintaining.
Using scripting or authoring languages, management tools, content creation tools, applications and digital media.
Conferring with teams to resolve conflicts, prioritize needs, develop content criteria, or choose solutions.
Directing or performing Website updates.
Developing or validating test routines and schedules to ensure that test cases mimic external interfaces and address all browser and device types.
Editing, writing, or designing Website content, and directing team members who produce content.
Maintaining an understanding of the latest Web applications and programming practices through education, study, and participation in conferences, workshops, and groups.
Back up files from Web sites to local directories for recovery.
Identifying problems uncovered by customer feedback and testing, and correcting or referring problems to appropriate personnel for correction.
Evaluating code to ensure it meets industry standards, is valid, is properly structured, and is compatible with browsers, devices, or operating systems.
Determining user needs by analyzing technical requirements.
Application Deadline: 29/10/2020
Job Types: Full-time, Walk-In
Salary: From ₹25,000.00 per month
Experience:
Wordpress: 1 year (Preferred)
web designing: 1 year (Preferred)
4: 1 year (Preferred)

Title: Web Designer
Description:
We are looking for an outstanding web developers to be responsible for the coding, innovative design and layout for our website. Web developers responsibilities include building our website from concept all the way to completion from the bottom up, fashioning everything from the home page to site layout and functions.
Responsibilities:
Write well designed, testable, efficient code by using best software Development practices.
Create website layout/ user interface by using standard HTML/ CSS practices.
Integrate data from various back end services and databases.
Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.
Create and maintain software documentation.
Be responsible for maintaining, expanding and scaling our website.
Stay plugged into emerging technologies/ industry trends and apply them into operations and activities.
Cooperate with senior project manager to match visual design intent.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹5,000.00 - ₹10,000.00 per month
Experience:
Wordpress: 1 year (Preferred)
web designing: 1 year (Preferred)
total work: 1 year (Preferred)
Education:
Bachelor's (Preferred)
Technical skills needed:
Photoshop 7 (Preferred)
HTML (Preferred)
Responsive Web Design (Preferred)
Benefits:
Paid leaves / Leave encashment

No

Title: JavaScript Developer - Minimum 2 years of experience
Description:
Responsibilities
1. Collaborate with the team to thoroughly understand the product and its features
2. Design, develop, and unit test for web application using JavaScript Frameworks
3. Work with the team to collaboratively own development part
4. Translate user and business needs into a functional web application
5. Maintain the quality of the code and suggest enhancements & optimizations
6. Diagnose functional issues, report bugs, and take ownership of issue resolution
7. Develop, enhance and maintain portals & web applications
8. Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use
9. Willingness to learn new platforms and adapt as requirements change
10. Should have experienced with version control like Git & GitHub
11. Train & guide freshers and frequently enhance their code & review
12. Commit to the deadline and stick to the milestones
Requirements
1. Vanilla Javascript and modern frameworks and platforms such as ReactJS, Angular, VueJS, and Node.js with HTML, CSS, Twitter Bootstrap, LESS, SASS knowledge
2. At least 2+ years of product development experience with expertise in designing and implementing high-performance web applications
3. Exceptional debugging skills and knowledge on browser developer tools
4. Experience with RESTful APIs to connect applications to back-end services
5. Experience in optimizing the application for performance and scalability, caching, etc
6. Strong experience and knowledge in single-page frameworks using ReactJS and the ability to design the architecture of single-page applications
7. Knowledge of Node server, Socket connections, and mechanisms to handle real-time async data would be a plus
8. Experience working with SQL / NoSQL data stores
9. Must exhibit strong problem-solving, analytical, and design skills
10. Experience in building responsive and elegant mobile and web applications
11. Experience with integrating and consuming third-party APIs
12. Experience with handling Cloud infrastructure, Amazon EC2 and S3 as well as Heroku
13. Deep experience in OOP JavaScript, Modular JavaScript, and ES6 or TypeScript
14. Must have good communication and personal skills
15. Ability to successfully work under tight project deadlines
Expected Start Date: 20/10/2020
Job Types: Full-time, Volunteer, Walk-In
Pay: ₹20,000.00 - ₹30,000.00 per month
Supplemental Pay:
Performance bonus
Experience:
ReactJS: 2 years (Preferred)
Git & GitHub: 2 years (Preferred)
JavaScript: 2 years (Preferred)
Chrome Developer Tool: 2 years (Preferred)
NoSQL: 2 years (Preferred)
Angular: 2 years (Preferred)
Twitter Bootstrap: 2 years (Preferred)
Node JS: 2 years (Preferred)
React Components: 2 years (Preferred)
HTML & CSS: 2 years (Preferred)
Education:
Bachelor's (Preferred)
Location:
Delhi, Delhi (Preferred)
Shifts:
Any (Preferred)
Work Remotely:
Yes

Title: Front End/UI Developer
Description:
This is for our Paytm Money Team. looking for talented user interface developers for its team in Bangalore. Successful candidates will work on building next gen web applications using ReactJS and wide array of front-end technologies. The UI layers have to be highly responsive, beautiful, performant and work for large scale consumer sites and mobile apps.
Responsibilities
Design, code, debug and test various functions
Produce functional specifications and design documents
Support and maintain developed code through system test and customer deployments.
Contribute to overall product requirements and design
Building reusable code and libraries for future use
Optimization of the application for maximum speed and scalability
Implementation of security and data protection
Translation of UI/UX wire-frames to visual elements
Integration of the front-end and back-end aspects of the web application
Implementation of a robust set of services and APIs to power the web application
Skills
Proficient knowledge of Javascript (ES6+) and HTML5
Hands on experience in one or more of major web frameworks (ReactJS, Vue)
Good understanding of server-side CSS preprocessors such as Stylus, Less, Sass etc.
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery and other frameworks such as Zepto, MooTools, etc
Understanding of HTTP protocol & REST APIs.
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, ability to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image.
Familiarity with tools such as Gimp or Photoshop is a plus.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools e.g. Git, Mercurial or SVN
Familiarity with development aiding tools such as Bower, Bundler, Rake, Gulp, etc.
Ability to implement automated testing platforms and unit tests
Qualifications
4+ years experience in building high quality web interfaces
Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science
Plus
1+ years of development exposure to Equity Brokerage / Financial products space
Good understanding of server-side templating languages such as Jade, EJS, Jinja, etc
Understanding differences between multiple delivery platforms (such as mobile vs, desktop), and optimizing output to match the specific platform
Understanding of fundamental design principles behind scalable applications
RxJS & Web Sockets
Familiarity with charting libraries (HighCharts & ChartIQ)
Location : work from home entire year
Job Type : Full-time opportunity
Salary best in the market
Contract length: 12 months
Job Types: Full-time, Contract
Salary: Up to ₹3,000,000.00 per year
Schedule:
Day shift
Experience:
html5: 4 years (Required)
unit testing: 2 years (Required)
ReactJS or Vue: 3 years (Required)
UI development: 4 years (Required)
Work Remotely:
Yes

Job Title: UI/ UX Developer – regular
Job Summary:
A UI, UX, and front-end web developer is responsible for applying interactive and visual design principles on websites and web applications for a positive and cohesive user experience. These developers use HTML, CSS, and other design tools to achieve responsive designs.
Job Responsibilities:
· Understand user interface problems and create design solutions that meet measurable business goals and requirements.
· Translate high-level requirements into interaction flows and then transform them into intuitive, and functional user interfaces.
· Understand web design plans and UI layout ideas.
· Create various web applications using code and visual design skills, which includes designing and creating user interface layouts and web pages.
· Developing HTML, HTML5 optimized/cross-platform front-end code.
· Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
Essential Qualifications:
· B.E/B.Tech (Any stream), MCA, BCA, or any other graduate.
· 0-3 Experience with coding and ability to troubleshoot using HTML, CSS and comparable languages.
· Experience in photoshop, bootstrap, angular
· Passion for innovation, balanced with business needs, and user expectations
Compensation: Project Based Compensation
Location: Remote/Client Location
Job Types: Full-time, Temporary, Walk-In
Salary: ₹25,000.00 - ₹40,000.00 per month
Experience:
Programming / HTML: 1 year (Preferred)
css: 1 year (Preferred)
total work: 1 year (Preferred)
AngularJS: 1 year (Preferred)
Licence:
Magneto (Preferred)
Work Remotely:
Temporarily due to COVID-19

Title: Front End Developer
Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
Responsibilities
Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Skills And Qualifications
Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery
Note: Every front-end developer is expected to have proficient knowledge of JavaScript, while most front-end developers should know jQuery.
Good understanding of HTML, CSS, Javascript and React
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as Figma or Photoshop is a plus.
Note: A UI/UX designer is expected to deliver finished resources for the developer to incorporate into the app. However, quite often a front-end a web developer needs to make some small adjustments.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that the application will adhere to them.
Expected Start Date: 1/11/2020
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹240,000.00 - ₹480,000.00 per year
Experience:
javascript: 1 year (Required)

Title: Web Developer Intern
Description:
We work in a collaborative environment delivering high quality work to clients across the world. We are young, prospering and full of opportunities!
Responsibilities:
1. Writing efficient code
2. Creating websites/a website using standard HTML/CSS practices
3. Working closely with web designers and programmers to produce the website
4. Constant communication with other colleagues in the business to develop and deploy their content - and ensuring there is a clear establishment of what can be created within what time-frame
5. Researching different software programs, maintaining software documentation
6. Implementing contingency plans in case the website goes down
7. Maintaining and expanding/enhancing the website once built
Who can apply: Only those freshers will be preferred who:
- are available for full time internship
- have relevant skills and interests
- are available for duration 3 - 6 months
Interested candidates can send their resumes to westandrecruit @ gmail.com

Title: UI/UX Developer
Description:
We are looking for programmers with a keen eye for design for the position of Front End Developer. Front end Developers are responsible for ensuring the alignment of web/software and App design and user experience requirements, optimizing web/software and app pages for maximum efficiency and maintaining brand consistency across all pages, among other duties.
Front End Developers are required to work in teams alongside Back end Developers, Graphic Designers and User Experience Designers to ensure all elements of web creation are consistent. This requires excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Front End Developer Responsibilities:
-Determining the structure and design of web/software and app pages.
-Ensuring user experience determines design choices.
-Developing features to enhance the user experience.
-Striking a balance between functional and aesthetic design.
-Ensuring web/software and app design is optimized for smartphones.
-Building reusable code for future use.
-Optimizing web pages for maximum speed and scalability.
-Utilizing a variety of markup languages to write web pages.
-Maintaining brand consistency throughout design.
Front End Developer Requirements:
-Degree in Computer Science or related field.
-Understanding of key design principles.
-Proficiency with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and jQuery.
-Understanding of server-side CSS.
-Experience with graphic design applications such as Adobe Illustrator.
-Experience with responsive and adaptive design.
-Understanding of SEO principles.
Good problem solving skills.
-Excellent verbal communication skills.
-Good interpersonal skills.
Job Types: Full-time, Volunteer
Salary: ₹15,000.00 - ₹40,000.00 per month
Schedule:
Flexible shift
Experience:
work: 1 year (Preferred)
development: 1 year (Required)
UX Design: 1 year (Preferred)
Education:
Bachelor's (Preferred)
Work Remotely:
Yes

Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS

Good understanding of HTML, CSS, Javascript and React
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as Figma or Photoshop is a plus.
Note: A UI/UX designer is expected to deliver finished resources for the developer to incorporate into the app. However, quite often a front-end a web developer needs to make some small adjustments.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that the application will adhere to them.

Title: UI/UX Developer
Description:
Skill: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap4 Angular
Job Responsibilities: UI/UX Developer
1. Create visually appealing websites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation.
2. Helps with maintenance and additions to the website.
3. Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex design roadblocks.
4. Create website layout/user interface as appropriately required.
5. Create and Integrate complex working hierarchical structures.
6. Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.
7. Create and maintain design documentation.
8. Design webpage layout and create back up files.
9. Collaborate with clients to define and implement innovative solutions for the product direction, visuals, and experience.
10. Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off.
11. Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps, to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas.
12. Create low-fidelity wireframes and quickly iterate based on feedback and synthesize multiple points of feedback into a thoughtful solution and response.
13. Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders.
14. Conduct user research, evaluate user feedback and execute on good user experience.
15. Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices, procedures, and standards.
Job Description:
1) Very strong knowledge in HTML, XHTML, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap. Demonstrable UIUX design skills Knowledge in Photoshop.
2) Knowledge of Web 2.0 design standards.
3) Experience in creating wire framing, storyboards, user flows & process flows.
4) Ability to successfully lead projects Up to date with the latest UIUX trends, techniques, and technologies.
5) Strong portfolio (please include a link or examples in job application).
6) Experience in responsive web designing and rich internet applications.
7) Experience in developing interactive web applications.
8) Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user - system interaction.
9) Ability to think critically, solve problems creatively and effectively.

Job Title: UI/ UX Developer – regular
Job Summary:
A UI, UX, and front-end web developer is responsible for applying interactive and visual design principles on websites and web applications for a positive and cohesive user experience. These developers use HTML, CSS, and other design tools to achieve responsive designs.
Job Responsibilities:
· Understand user interface problems and create design solutions that meet measurable business goals and requirements.
· Translate high-level requirements into interaction flows and then transform them into intuitive, and functional user interfaces.
· Understand web design plans and UI layout ideas.
· Create various web applications using code and visual design skills, which includes designing and creating user interface layouts and web pages.
· Developing HTML, HTML5 optimized/cross-platform front-end code.
· Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
Essential Qualifications:
· B.E/B.Tech (Any stream), MCA, BCA, or any other graduate.
· 0-3 Experience with coding and ability to troubleshoot using HTML, CSS and comparable languages.
· Experience in photoshop, bootstrap, angular
· Passion for innovation, balanced with business needs, and user expectations
Compensation: Project Based Compensation
Location: Remote/Client Location

Title: Associate Software Engineer
Description:
Roles and Responsibilities
Introduction
As an Associate Software Engineer, you will lead Dec6 into the future by translating system requirements into the design and development of customized systems in an agile environment. The success of Dec6 is underpinned by its resources who would transform vital business needs into code and drive innovation. Your work will power Dec6 and its clients globally, collaborating and integrating code into enterprise systems. You will have access to the latest education, tools and technology, and a limitless career path with the world’s technology leader. Come to Dec6 and make a global impact!
As an Associate Software Engineer, your day in the role will include…
Development, implementation and providing solutions to the given problem in all the Web technologies
Build together end to end application starting from front end web development, back end development, middleware integration and persisting data in no SQL or DBMS database
Strong into trends and directions of the Industry, marketplace and the players
Provide objective guidance without personal or political considerations
You will come with…
Sound knowledge in OOP concepts well. Should be proficient in exception handling , collections, Abstract Classes and Interfaces, Constructors, File IO and Serialization, Collections (List, Map, Set), Access Specifiers, Exceptions (Checked, Unchecked), Generics, Java Keywords (Static, Final, Volatile, Synchronized, Transient), JVM and Memory Management, Multithreading and Synchronization, JSP/ Servlets,JMS . Should be skilled in one of the IDEs like Eclipse , IntelliJ. Should be conversant with Build tools like Ant , Maven.
Working knowledge in HTML 5 , CSS3, Angular JS, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, REST API, JUnit, React
How we’ll help you grow:
You’ll have access to all the technical and management training material that will help you
You’ll learn directly from guide developers in the field; our team leads love to mentor
You have the opportunity to work in many different areas to identify what really excites you
Required Technical and Professional Expertise
Java 8 , JEE, Spring Core, Spring Boot, Spring MVC, REST , Hibernate, Angular JS , Node JS, CSS3 , HTML5, Any RDBMS database (DB2, Postgre, MYSQL, Oracle etc.) and Sql knowledge , Git , Maven, Eclipse / Intellij, Design Patterns
Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise
AWS, GCP, or any cloud based development
Please drop in your CV at our Facebook, Instagram or Linkedin page.
Contract length: 6 months
Expected Start Date: 26/10/2020
Job Types: Contract, Fresher

Monday to Friday

Performance bonus

Mobile App Development: 1 year (Preferred)
total work: 1 year (Preferred)

Secondary(10th Pass) (Preferred)

Yes

Title: Front End Developer
Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
Responsibilities
Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Skills And Qualifications
Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery
Note: Every front-end developer is expected to have proficient knowledge of JavaScript, while most front-end developers should know jQuery.
Good understanding of HTML, CSS, Javascript and React
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as Figma or Photoshop is a plus.
Note: A UI/UX designer is expected to deliver finished resources for the developer to incorporate into the app. However, quite often a front-end a web developer needs to make some small adjustments.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that the application will adhere to them.
Expected Start Date: 1/11/2020
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹240,000.00 - ₹480,000.00 per year
Experience:
javascript: 1 year (Required)

Title: JavaScript Developer - Minimum 2 years of experience
Description:
Responsibilities
1. Collaborate with the team to thoroughly understand the product and its features
2. Design, develop, and unit test for web application using JavaScript Frameworks
3. Work with the team to collaboratively own development part
4. Translate user and business needs into a functional web application
5. Maintain the quality of the code and suggest enhancements & optimizations
6. Diagnose functional issues, report bugs, and take ownership of issue resolution
7. Develop, enhance and maintain portals & web applications
8. Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use
9. Willingness to learn new platforms and adapt as requirements change
10. Should have experienced with version control like Git & GitHub
11. Train & guide freshers and frequently enhance their code & review
12. Commit to the deadline and stick to the milestones
Requirements
1. Vanilla Javascript and modern frameworks and platforms such as ReactJS, Angular, VueJS, and Node.js with HTML, CSS, Twitter Bootstrap, LESS, SASS knowledge
2. At least 2+ years of product development experience with expertise in designing and implementing high-performance web applications
3. Exceptional debugging skills and knowledge on browser developer tools
4. Experience with RESTful APIs to connect applications to back-end services
5. Experience in optimizing the application for performance and scalability, caching, etc
6. Strong experience and knowledge in single-page frameworks using ReactJS and the ability to design the architecture of single-page applications
7. Knowledge of Node server, Socket connections, and mechanisms to handle real-time async data would be a plus
8. Experience working with SQL / NoSQL data stores
9. Must exhibit strong problem-solving, analytical, and design skills
10. Experience in building responsive and elegant mobile and web applications
11. Experience with integrating and consuming third-party APIs
12. Experience with handling Cloud infrastructure, Amazon EC2 and S3 as well as Heroku
13. Deep experience in OOP JavaScript, Modular JavaScript, and ES6 or TypeScript
14. Must have good communication and personal skills
15. Ability to successfully work under tight project deadlines
Expected Start Date: 20/10/2020
Job Types: Full-time, Volunteer, Walk-In
Pay: ₹20,000.00 - ₹30,000.00 per month
Supplemental Pay:
Performance bonus

Title: Web Designer & Developer
Description:
Job description
Position: Web Designer & Developer
Vacancies: 20
Salary: 2 - 5 Lakh per annum
Eligibility:
Qualification - BE/B.SC/ B. Tech/BCA/ M. Tech/ MCA
At least 2 4 years of professional experience
Ready to join immediately or less than 30 days
Responsibilities: -
Design, create and maintain web content to meet client expectations.
Design page layouts and templates
Conceptualize original website design ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex roadblocks.
Conceptualizing creative ideas with clients.
Preparing Design Plans and presenting the website structure.
Designing visual imagery for websites and ensuring that they are in line with branding for client.
Work with various aspects of website creation, from the coding element to ensuring a site is responsive and optimized for search engines.
Desired Candidate Profile: -
1-3 years of relevant work experience in web designing.
Strong coding skills and experience (HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript, JQUERY, JavaScript, illustrator Photoshop,)
In-depth knowledge of web designing.
Exposure to Javascript MVC frameworks like Angular and React.
Proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator or other visual design and wire-framing tools.
Experience with web page versioning/source control and of Content Management Systems.
Strong typography, layout and visual design skills .
Must be a quick learner, hardworking, and self-driven .
Use proper coding standards deliver bug-free codes
Ability to work individually and meet deadlines is a must.
Artistic eye for design, user interaction, functionality, and readability
Multi-tasking and working in a fast-moving environment.

Title: UI/UX Developer
Description:
Skill: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap4 Angular
Job Responsibilities: UI/UX Developer
1. Create visually appealing websites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation.
2. Helps with maintenance and additions to the website.
3. Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex design roadblocks.
4. Create website layout/user interface as appropriately required.
5. Create and Integrate complex working hierarchical structures.
6. Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.
7. Create and maintain design documentation.
8. Design webpage layout and create back up files.
9. Collaborate with clients to define and implement innovative solutions for the product direction, visuals, and experience.
10. Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off.
11. Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps, to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas.
12. Create low-fidelity wireframes and quickly iterate based on feedback and synthesize multiple points of feedback into a thoughtful solution and response.
13. Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders.
14. Conduct user research, evaluate user feedback and execute on good user experience.
15. Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices, procedures, and standards.
Job Description:
1) Very strong knowledge in HTML, XHTML, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap. Demonstrable UIUX design skills Knowledge in Photoshop.
2) Knowledge of Web 2.0 design standards.
3) Experience in creating wire framing, storyboards, user flows & process flows.
4) Ability to successfully lead projects Up to date with the latest UIUX trends, techniques, and technologies.
5) Strong portfolio (please include a link or examples in job application).
6) Experience in responsive web designing and rich internet applications.
7) Experience in developing interactive web applications.
8) Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user - system interaction.
9) Ability to think critically, solve problems creatively and effectively.

Title: Front End Developer
Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
Responsibilities
Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Skills And Qualifications
Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery
Note: Every front-end developer is expected to have proficient knowledge of JavaScript, while most front-end developers should know jQuery.
Good understanding of HTML, CSS, Javascript and React
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as Figma or Photoshop is a plus.
Note: A UI/UX designer is expected to deliver finished resources for the developer to incorporate into the app. However, quite often a front-end a web developer needs to make some small adjustments.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that the application will adhere to them.
Expected Start Date: 1/11/2020
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹240,000.00 - ₹480,000.00 per year
Experience:
javascript: 1 year (Required)

Title: JavaScript Developer - Minimum 2 years of experience
Description:
Responsibilities
1. Collaborate with the team to thoroughly understand the product and its features
2. Design, develop, and unit test for web application using JavaScript Frameworks
3. Work with the team to collaboratively own development part
4. Translate user and business needs into a functional web application

3. Exceptional debugging skills and knowledge on browser developer tools
4. Experience with RESTful APIs to connect applications to back-end services

9. Must exhibit strong problem-solving, analytical, and design skills

11. Experience with integrating and consuming third-party APIs
12. Experience with handling Cloud infrastructure, Amazon EC2 and S3 as well as Heroku

14. Must have good communication and personal skills

Title: UI/UX Developer
Description:
Skill: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap4 Angular
Job Responsibilities: UI/UX Developer
1. Create visually appealing websites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation.
2. Helps with maintenance and additions to the website.
3. Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex design roadblocks.
4. Create website layout/user interface as appropriately required.
5. Create and Integrate complex working hierarchical structures.
6. Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.
7. Create and maintain design documentation.
8. Design webpage layout and create back up files.
9. Collaborate with clients to define and implement innovative solutions for the product direction, visuals, and experience.
10. Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off.
11. Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps, to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas.
12. Create low-fidelity wireframes and quickly iterate based on feedback and synthesize multiple points of feedback into a thoughtful solution and response.
13. Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders.
14. Conduct user research, evaluate user feedback and execute on good user experience.
15. Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices, procedures, and standards.
Job Description:
1) Very strong knowledge in HTML, XHTML, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap. Demonstrable UIUX design skills Knowledge in Photoshop.
2) Knowledge of Web 2.0 design standards.
3) Experience in creating wire framing, storyboards, user flows & process flows.
4) Ability to successfully lead projects Up to date with the latest UIUX trends, techniques, and technologies.
5) Strong portfolio (please include a link or examples in job application).
6) Experience in responsive web designing and rich internet applications.
7) Experience in developing interactive web applications.
8) Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user - system interaction.
9) Ability to think critically, solve problems creatively and effectively.

1. Create visually appealing websites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation.
2. Helps with maintenance and additions to the website.
3. Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex design roadblocks.
4. Create website layout/user interface as appropriately required.
5. Create and Integrate complex working hierarchical structures.
6. Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.
7. Create and maintain design documentation.
8. Design webpage layout and create back up files.
9. Collaborate with clients to define and implement innovative solutions for the product direction, visuals, and experience.
10. Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off.
11. Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps, to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas.
12. Create low-fidelity wireframes and quickly iterate based on feedback and synthesize multiple points of feedback into a thoughtful solution and response.
13. Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders.
14. Conduct user research, evaluate user feedback and execute on good user experience.
15. Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices, procedures, and standards.
Job Description:
1) Very strong knowledge in HTML, XHTML, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap. Demonstrable UIUX design skills Knowledge in Photoshop.
2) Knowledge of Web 2.0 design standards.
3) Experience in creating wire framing, storyboards, user flows & process flows.
4) Ability to successfully lead projects Up to date with the latest UIUX trends, techniques, and technologies.
5) Strong portfolio (please include a link or examples in job application).
6) Experience in responsive web designing and rich internet applications.
7) Experience in developing interactive web applications.
8) Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user - system interaction.
9) Ability to think critically, solve problems creatively and effectively.

Title: Front End Developer
Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
Responsibilities
Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Skills And Qualifications
Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery
Note: Every front-end developer is expected to have proficient knowledge of JavaScript, while most front-end developers should know jQuery.
Good understanding of HTML, CSS, Javascript and React
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as Figma or Photoshop is a plus.
Note: A UI/UX designer is expected to deliver finished resources for the developer to incorporate into the app. However, quite often a front-end a web developer needs to make some small adjustments.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that the application will adhere to them.
Expected Start Date: 1/11/2020
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹240,000.00 - ₹480,000.00 per year
Experience:
javascript: 1 year (Required)

Title: UI/UX Developer
Description:
Roles and Responsibilities
The nature of the job would be to develop and maintain web platforms built in-house.
We are looking for a programmer with a keen eye for design. Responsible for ensuring the alignment of web design and user experience requirements, optimizing web pages for maximum efficiency and maintaining brand consistency across all web pages.
Front End Developers are required to work in teams alongside Back end Developers, Graphic Designers and User Experience Designers to ensure all elements of web creation are consistent. Reasoning skills, analytics skills and sound knowledge of Bootstrap. Learn and grow together in a fast-paced environment.

Experience with responsive and adaptive design
Understanding of SEO principles

Title: UI/UX Developer
Description:
Skill: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap4 Angular
Job Responsibilities: UI/UX Developer
1. Create visually appealing websites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation.
2. Helps with maintenance and additions to the website.
3. Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex design roadblocks.
4. Create website layout/user interface as appropriately required.
5. Create and Integrate complex working hierarchical structures.
6. Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.
7. Create and maintain design documentation.
8. Design webpage layout and create back up files.
9. Collaborate with clients to define and implement innovative solutions for the product direction, visuals, and experience.
10. Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off.
11. Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps, to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas.
12. Create low-fidelity wireframes and quickly iterate based on feedback and synthesize multiple points of feedback into a thoughtful solution and response.
13. Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders.
14. Conduct user research, evaluate user feedback and execute on good user experience.
15. Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices, procedures, and standards.
Job Description:
1) Very strong knowledge in HTML, XHTML, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap. Demonstrable UIUX design skills Knowledge in Photoshop.
2) Knowledge of Web 2.0 design standards.
3) Experience in creating wire framing, storyboards, user flows & process flows.
4) Ability to successfully lead projects Up to date with the latest UIUX trends, techniques, and technologies.
5) Strong portfolio (please include a link or examples in job application).
6) Experience in responsive web designing and rich internet applications.
7) Experience in developing interactive web applications.
8) Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user - system interaction.
9) Ability to think critically, solve problems creatively and effectively.

Title: Front End Developer
Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
Responsibilities
Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Skills And Qualifications
Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery
Note: Every front-end developer is expected to have proficient knowledge of JavaScript, while most front-end developers should know jQuery.
Good understanding of HTML, CSS, Javascript and React
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as Figma or Photoshop is a plus.
Note: A UI/UX designer is expected to deliver finished resources for the developer to incorporate into the app. However, quite often a front-end a web developer needs to make some small adjustments.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that the application will adhere to them.
Expected Start Date: 1/11/2020
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹240,000.00 - ₹480,000.00 per year
Experience:
javascript: 1 year (Required)

Title: UI/UX Designer
Description:
Futuristic Labs is exactly what it sounds like - a place to 'dream' & 'build' futuristic products. We are an enthusiastic team working towards building innovative consumer products to make sure we have a healthier and superior lifestyle in the future.
We are looking for a talented designer with the mindset of an engineer and a hacker who has experience with both aspects of modern interface design: UI & UX: to design and shape unique, user-centric experiences.
All our products have an on-device screen, a companion mobile app and a web app. We are looking are for someone who can create seamless intuitive visual experience across all the endpoints where user’s interact.
Qualities we are looking for:
* Fine-tuned attention to detail and pixel-perfect execution.
* Strong visualization skills You should be able to translate the team’s ideas into reality.
* To be able to keep up with the stress and demanding nature of a startup(we are talking about weekly prototyping cycles).
* High context switching ability, you will be working on multiple projects as time goes on.
* We are just starting, everyone wears several hats. You should be comfortable working outside the boundaries of traditional engineering disciplines.
* The most important quality we seek is a strong inclination for ‘User Centric Design’.
Skills we are looking for:
- Experience with User Interface design softwares like Sketch, Adobe XD or Figma.It’s not about which tool you use but how well you can use it.
- Experience in UX research: creating wireframes, storyboards, user-flows, etc.
- Experience with Interaction & Animation tools/libraries.
- Experience with frontend frameworks like React.
- Basic knowledge of the HTML, CSS & Javascript as we use ReactJs/ReactNative for all our development.
- Experience with handing off assets to developers in different formats suitable to device/mobile or web development.
- Previous experience in designing experiences for consumer devices.
We prefer portfolio's over degrees. So please include a link to your portfolio in the notes section.( Behance, Yanko design, personal page etc... somewhere we can take a look).
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹200,000.00 - ₹400,000.00 per year
Experience:
total work: 1 year (Preferred)
UI/UX: 1 year (Preferred)
Work Remotely:
Temporarily due to COVID-19

Title: UI/UX Developer
Description:
Skill: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap4 Angular
Job Responsibilities: UI/UX Developer
1. Create visually appealing websites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation.
2. Helps with maintenance and additions to the website.
3. Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex design roadblocks.
4. Create website layout/user interface as appropriately required.
5. Create and Integrate complex working hierarchical structures.
6. Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.
7. Create and maintain design documentation.
8. Design webpage layout and create back up files.
9. Collaborate with clients to define and implement innovative solutions for the product direction, visuals, and experience.
10. Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off.
11. Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps, to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas.
12. Create low-fidelity wireframes and quickly iterate based on feedback and synthesize multiple points of feedback into a thoughtful solution and response.
13. Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders.
14. Conduct user research, evaluate user feedback and execute on good user experience.
15. Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices, procedures, and standards.
Job Description:
1) Very strong knowledge in HTML, XHTML, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap. Demonstrable UIUX design skills Knowledge in Photoshop.
2) Knowledge of Web 2.0 design standards.
3) Experience in creating wire framing, storyboards, user flows & process flows.
4) Ability to successfully lead projects Up to date with the latest UIUX trends, techniques, and technologies.
5) Strong portfolio (please include a link or examples in job application).
6) Experience in responsive web designing and rich internet applications.
7) Experience in developing interactive web applications.
8) Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user - system interaction.
9) Ability to think critically, solve problems creatively and effectively.

Title: UI/UX Developer
Description:
Roles and Responsibilities
The nature of the job would be to develop and maintain web platforms built in-house.
We are looking for a programmer with a keen eye for design. Responsible for ensuring the alignment of web design and user experience requirements, optimizing web pages for maximum efficiency and maintaining brand consistency across all web pages.
Front End Developers are required to work in teams alongside Back end Developers, Graphic Designers and User Experience Designers to ensure all elements of web creation are consistent. Reasoning skills, analytics skills and sound knowledge of Bootstrap. Learn and grow together in a fast-paced environment.

Title: web designer front end developer jobs in Ahmedabad
Description:
We are looking for an outstanding Web Developer to be responsible for the coding, innovative design and layout of our website. Web developer responsibilities include building our website from concept all the way to completion from the bottom up, fashioning everything from the home page to site layout and function.
Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS
and SASS
Rock-solid understanding of JavaScript as we don't stick to any framework as such. Should be able to juggle between Angular, React, Electron, Flutter as in when needed.
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates,and AJAX.
Hands-on experience in optimizing the UI of an application.
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as Gimp or Photoshop is a plus.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.
