Title: UI/UX Developer
Description:
Skill: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap4 Angular
Job Responsibilities: UI/UX Developer
1. Create visually appealing websites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation.
2. Helps with maintenance and additions to the website.
3. Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex design roadblocks.
4. Create website layout/user interface as appropriately required.
5. Create and Integrate complex working hierarchical structures.
6. Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.
7. Create and maintain design documentation.
8. Design webpage layout and create back up files.
9. Collaborate with clients to define and implement innovative solutions for the product direction, visuals, and experience.
10. Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off.
11. Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps, to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas.
12. Create low-fidelity wireframes and quickly iterate based on feedback and synthesize multiple points of feedback into a thoughtful solution and response.
13. Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders.
14. Conduct user research, evaluate user feedback and execute on good user experience.
15. Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices, procedures, and standards.
Job Description:
1) Very strong knowledge in HTML, XHTML, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap. Demonstrable UIUX design skills Knowledge in Photoshop.
2) Knowledge of Web 2.0 design standards.
3) Experience in creating wire framing, storyboards, user flows & process flows.
4) Ability to successfully lead projects Up to date with the latest UIUX trends, techniques, and technologies.
5) Strong portfolio (please include a link or examples in job application).
6) Experience in responsive web designing and rich internet applications.
7) Experience in developing interactive web applications.
8) Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user - system interaction.
9) Ability to think critically, solve problems creatively and effectively.
Role Software Developer
Industry Type IT-Software, Software Services
Functional Area IT Software - Application Programming, Maintenance
Employment Type Full Time, Permanent
Role Category Programming & Design
Notice Period- Immediate/ 15 days/ 30 days

Salary: ₹400,000.00 - ₹700,000.00 per year
Schedule:

Title: Front-end Development - Internship
Description:
We are looking for a qualified front-end developer to join our tech team. You will be responsible for building the ‘client-side’ of our web applications. You should be able to translate UI/UX design and customer needs into functional and appealing interactive applications.
We expect you to be a tech-savvy professional, who is curious about new digital technologies and aspires to combine usability with visual design.
Requirements:
Basic understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks like AngularJS or VueJS or ReactJS
Basic understanding of asynchronous request handling, page updates, and AJAX
Responsibilities:
Translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application.
Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Design mobile-based features
Stipend:
INR ₹8000-12000/Month
Other perks::
Training,Certificate, Letter of Recommendation, Job offer, 5 days work week.
How to Apply:
Please share your resume via email or link in the job board
Please email files and links to hr@appandgeek.com with email subject as “Front-end Development Internship”

Title: Front End Development part time job/internship at Pune
Description:
About the company:
SkillBit is a leading staffing and recruitment company engaged in talent searching assignments for skilled and talented candidates for the industry.
About the internship/job:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 1. Design front end for websites 2. Use markup languages like HTML to create user-friendly web pages 3. Collaborate with back-end developers and web designers to improve usability 4. Create quality mockups and prototypes
Who can apply:
Only those students or freshers can apply who:
are available for the part time job/internship (it may be part time in-office or part time at home/work from home online)
have relevant skills and interests
can start the part time job/internship between 9th Oct'20 and 13th Nov'20
are available for duration of 1 month
have already graduated or are currently in any year of study
Females willing to start/restart their career may also apply
Number of internships/jobs available: 5

Title: UI/UX Developer
Description:
Skill: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap4 Angular
Job Responsibilities: UI/UX Developer
1. Create visually appealing websites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation.
2. Helps with maintenance and additions to the website.
3. Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex design roadblocks.
4. Create website layout/user interface as appropriately required.
5. Create and Integrate complex working hierarchical structures.
6. Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.
7. Create and maintain design documentation.
8. Design webpage layout and create back up files.
9. Collaborate with clients to define and implement innovative solutions for the product direction, visuals, and experience.
10. Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off.
11. Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps, to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas.
12. Create low-fidelity wireframes and quickly iterate based on feedback and synthesize multiple points of feedback into a thoughtful solution and response.
13. Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders.
14. Conduct user research, evaluate user feedback and execute on good user experience.
15. Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices, procedures, and standards.
Job Description:
1) Very strong knowledge in HTML, XHTML, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap. Demonstrable UIUX design skills Knowledge in Photoshop.
2) Knowledge of Web 2.0 design standards.
3) Experience in creating wire framing, storyboards, user flows & process flows.
4) Ability to successfully lead projects Up to date with the latest UIUX trends, techniques, and technologies.
5) Strong portfolio (please include a link or examples in job application).
6) Experience in responsive web designing and rich internet applications.
7) Experience in developing interactive web applications.
8) Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user - system interaction.
9) Ability to think critically, solve problems creatively and effectively.
Role Software Developer
Industry Type IT-Software, Software Services
Functional Area IT Software - Application Programming, Maintenance
Employment Type Full Time, Permanent
Role Category Programming & Design
Notice Period- Immediate/ 15 days/ 30 days

Monday to Friday

Title: UI/UX Developer
Description:
We are looking for programmers with a keen eye for design for the position of Front End Developer. Front end Developers are responsible for ensuring the alignment of web/software and App design and user experience requirements, optimizing web/software and app pages for maximum efficiency and maintaining brand consistency across all pages, among other duties.
Front End Developers are required to work in teams alongside Back end Developers, Graphic Designers and User Experience Designers to ensure all elements of web creation are consistent. This requires excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Front End Developer Responsibilities:
-Determining the structure and design of web/software and app pages.
-Ensuring user experience determines design choices.
-Developing features to enhance the user experience.
-Striking a balance between functional and aesthetic design.
-Ensuring web/software and app design is optimized for smartphones.
-Building reusable code for future use.
-Optimizing web pages for maximum speed and scalability.
-Utilizing a variety of markup languages to write web pages.
-Maintaining brand consistency throughout design.
Front End Developer Requirements:
-Degree in Computer Science or related field.
-Understanding of key design principles.
-Proficiency with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and jQuery.
-Understanding of server-side CSS.
-Experience with graphic design applications such as Adobe Illustrator.
-Experience with responsive and adaptive design.
-Understanding of SEO principles.
Good problem solving skills.
-Excellent verbal communication skills.
-Good interpersonal skills.
Job Types: Full-time, Volunteer
Salary: ₹15,000.00 - ₹40,000.00 per month
Schedule:
Flexible shift
Experience:
work: 1 year (Preferred)
development: 1 year (Required)
UX Design: 1 year (Preferred)
Education:
Bachelor's (Preferred)
Work Remotely:
Yes

Description:
We are looking for programmers with a keen eye for design for the position of Front End Developer. Front end Developers are responsible for ensuring the alignment of web/software and App design and user experience requirements, optimizing web/software and app pages for maximum efficiency and maintaining brand consistency across all pages, among other duties.
Front End Developers are required to work in teams alongside Back end Developers, Graphic Designers and User Experience Designers to ensure all elements of web creation are consistent. This requires excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Front End Developer Responsibilities:
-Determining the structure and design of web/software and app pages.
-Ensuring user experience determines design choices.
-Developing features to enhance the user experience.
-Striking a balance between functional and aesthetic design.
-Ensuring web/software and app design is optimized for smartphones.
-Building reusable code for future use.
-Optimizing web pages for maximum speed and scalability.
-Utilizing a variety of markup languages to write web pages.
-Maintaining brand consistency throughout design.
Front End Developer Requirements:
-Degree in Computer Science or related field.
-Understanding of key design principles.
-Proficiency with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and jQuery.
-Understanding of server-side CSS.
-Experience with graphic design applications such as Adobe Illustrator.
-Experience with responsive and adaptive design.
-Understanding of SEO principles.
Good problem solving skills.
-Excellent verbal communication skills.
-Good interpersonal skills.
Job Types: Full-time, Volunteer
Salary: ₹15,000.00 - ₹40,000.00 per month
Schedule:
Flexible shift
Experience:
work: 1 year (Preferred)
development: 1 year (Required)
UX Design: 1 year (Preferred)
Education:
Bachelor's (Preferred)
Work Remotely:
Yes

Title: Senior Graphic Designer
Description:
About Atom CTO:
Our long term vision is to change the way that software is built! We have worked with some of the largest IT outsourcing companies around the world, so we know what goes on behind the scenes. Gone are the days of working like crazy in order to meet ridiculous deadlines, sacrificing your evenings and weekends and for what? Life is too short for that.
Atom CTO provides Fractional CTO services to start-ups and small businesses around the world, specializing in architecting and building software systems across a number of industries. The company was founded organically by a small group of IT veterans who have all been in the space for 20 years, working for start-ups, large MNCs and global consulting companies such as PwC, IBM, not to mention a bunch of amazing companies you’ve probably never heard of!
In order to change the world, we need help. Help from motivated technologists like yourself who take pride in their work and want to work in an environment that supports creativity and freedom to express yourself.
The Job:
Atom CTO is looking to hire a Senior Designer to join their team in a full-time role, working directly with Atom’s marketing team.
About You:
Minimum 4 years of relevant professional experience
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in visual communication, Graphic Design (specializing in digital media) or a related field. Or, equivalent demonstrated experience and expertise.
Strong creative portfolio demonstrating breadth of creative capabilities, with a focus on design and animations
Expert knowledge of standard design software (Adobe tools, Mac platform, etc.)
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Desire and ability to learn quickly self-starting, highly motivated, fast working
Ability to present to senior leadership with clear, compelling reasoning for creative solutions
Ability to juggle and manage multiple and complex projects, effectively within the deadline and expectations
Responsibilities:
Overseeing & developing all design projects, from conception to delivery
Designing original pieces, including illustrations, icons, logos, infographics and animated videos.
Work within brand guidelines to create layouts that reinforce a brands style or voice through its visual touchpoints
Working knowledge of web development and software tools for close collaboration with developers
Work as part of a highly motivated, distributed team of experts
Coordinating with other teams and team members
Managing your own time and reporting your progress
Key Skills:
Corporate branding
Print Design
Web banners and Ads
Website and App
Video and 2D animation
Benefits:
Competitive pay with bonuses
Choose where you work from, always, not just because of the current pandemic
Flexible hours. We don’t mind if you’re an early riser or a night owl
Work/life balance - We hate working long hours and so should you
Educate - Learning is so important, we love to share knowledge within the company whether it’s a hobby of yours you want to talk about or some new cool tech you found
Opportunity to relocate to Bangalore
Variety - It’s the spice of life!

Title: UI/UX Design part time job/internship at Multiple locations
Description:
About the company:
We are a design collective specializing in user experience, brand & identity, film and motion graphics. In a world where the lines between the real and the virtual are blurring, our attempt is to change the idea of a "job" to something beyond its typical structure. We aim to create a virtual network of creative thinkers - be it designers, coders, strategists, artists or makers, who can collaborate while on the move, work flexibly on large scale projects and create things that are beautiful both inside and out. We are looking for people who share this vision and want to be a part of it. We are looking for people who aim to understand the core of things, who base the upper layers on strong inner layers and who are excited about creating something from scratch. We are looking for thinkers who can solve a problem, who have not lost their sense of awe for this ever-changing world and who can create magic by bringing things to life both virtually and physically.
About the internship/job:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 1. Working on defining the user experience for two upcoming products in the B2B and B2C segments 2. Facilitating the clientâ€™s product visions by researching, conceiving, wire-framing, sketching, prototyping, and mocking up user experiences for digital products 3. Designing and delivering wireframes, user stories, user journeys, and mockups optimized for a wide range of devices and interfaces 4. Designing a final finished UI while keeping in mind best practices for Android, iOS, and web 5. Making strategic designs and user-experience decisions related to core and new functions and features 6. Taking a user-centric design approach and rapidly test and iterate your designs 7. Collaborating with other team members and stakeholders 8. Performing a design QA and working closely with developers to ensure smooth implementation of the designs
Who can apply:
Only those students or freshers can apply who:
are available for the part time job/internship (it may be part time in-office or part time at home/work from home online)
have relevant skills and interests
can start the part time job/internship between 7th Oct'20 and 11th Nov'20
are available for duration of 4 months
have already graduated or are currently in any year of study
Females willing to start/restart their career may also apply
Number of internships/jobs available: 1
Categories: UI/UX

Title: Web Designer & Developer
Description:
Strong Full Stack Web Designing & Development (Wordpress)( Elementor, Visual Composer, Theme Design, Woo Commerce ) is a must. Experience with Shopify, Prestashop, Magento is preferred.
We are currently seeking talented, reliable, and team-oriented Web designers & developer. We are a performance-based company, which means we must always keep client growth in mind in everything we do. You must be able to understand client needs and deliver project deliverable in a timely manner that will over-exceed the client expectations.
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Minimum 3 years of experience as a web designer/developer with a strong portfolio.
Passionate about (responsive) web design, user experience, and front end development
Good proficiency in HTML, CSS, jQuery, JavaScript.
Proven experience with WordPress, including modifying and/or creating custom WordPress themes.
E-commerce experience is required.
Working knowledge of current best practices for web and cross-browser compatibility, with the motivation to continue self-education.
Mastery of the Adobe Creative Suite, specifically, Photoshop and Illustrator is a plus.
Strong graphic design skills, including an eye for good typography, composition, and use of color is a plus
Experience with Information Architecture or User Experience Design
Highly motivated personality. We’re looking for someone who wants to learn quickly, not be afraid of failing, and ultimately produce high-quality work.
Job Type and Category
Full Time
Company Profile
We're a growing IT company providing the full range of services for our clients - design and build of web apps, mobile apps digital marketing.
Our clients are start-ups, corporations including some household names, and everything in between.
We work across a wide range of industries and disciplines. As part of our diverse team, you will receive many opportunities for growth and development - you just need to be willing to dive in and apply your talents.
What's on Offer
Attractive Salary
Formal training and well-defined career progression.
Regular team building activities.
Please Note: Resume with work portfolio are only accepted.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹25,000.00 - ₹40,000.00 per month

Title: UI/UX Developer
Description:
Skill: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap4 Angular
Job Responsibilities: UI/UX Developer
1. Create visually appealing websites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation.
2. Helps with maintenance and additions to the website.
3. Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex design roadblocks.
4. Create website layout/user interface as appropriately required.
5. Create and Integrate complex working hierarchical structures.
6. Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.
7. Create and maintain design documentation.
8. Design webpage layout and create back up files.
9. Collaborate with clients to define and implement innovative solutions for the product direction, visuals, and experience.
10. Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off.
11. Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps, to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas.
12. Create low-fidelity wireframes and quickly iterate based on feedback and synthesize multiple points of feedback into a thoughtful solution and response.
13. Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders.
14. Conduct user research, evaluate user feedback and execute on good user experience.
15. Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices, procedures, and standards.
Job Description:
1) Very strong knowledge in HTML, XHTML, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap. Demonstrable UIUX design skills Knowledge in Photoshop.
2) Knowledge of Web 2.0 design standards.
3) Experience in creating wire framing, storyboards, user flows & process flows.
4) Ability to successfully lead projects Up to date with the latest UIUX trends, techniques, and technologies.
5) Strong portfolio (please include a link or examples in job application).
6) Experience in responsive web designing and rich internet applications.
7) Experience in developing interactive web applications.
8) Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user - system interaction.
9) Ability to think critically, solve problems creatively and effectively.

Position: Web Designer & Developer

Job Summary
The Designer is responsible for designing, coding and modifying websites, from layout to function.
We are looking for a talented Web Designer to create amazing user experiences. The ideal candidate should have an eye for clean and artful web design. They should also have superior user interface design skills.
The successful candidate will be able to translate high-level requirements into interaction flows and artifacts. They will be able to transform them into beautiful, intuitive, and functional designs.
Responsibilities and Duties
Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off to engineering
Conceptualize original website design ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex roadblocks

Present and defend designs and key deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders
Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices and standards
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Proven work experience as a web designer
Demonstrable graphic design skills with a strong portfolio
Solid experience in creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps
Proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator or other visual design and wire-framing tools
Proficiency in HTML, CSS and JavaScript for rapid prototyping
Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process
Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user-system interaction
Ability to solve problems creatively and effectively
Up-to-date with the latest Web trends, techniques and technologies
BS/MS in Human-Computer Interaction, Interaction Design or a Visual Arts subject

Description:
About the company:
KUKbit Software Lab helps clients manage their cloud environments from initial design through building, deploying, and ongoing management. We apply best practices that are developed over 5+ years in traditional IT and 3+ years as a premier AWS partner to help and ensure that our client's environment is secure, meet compliance requirements and maintain high availability to provide the broadest set of services and security for enterprise-grade apps, across any multi-cloud environment.

Title: UI/UX Developer
Description:
Skill: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap4 Angular
Job Responsibilities: UI/UX Developer
1. Create visually appealing websites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation.
2. Helps with maintenance and additions to the website.
3. Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex design roadblocks.
4. Create website layout/user interface as appropriately required.
5. Create and Integrate complex working hierarchical structures.
6. Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.
7. Create and maintain design documentation.
8. Design webpage layout and create back up files.
9. Collaborate with clients to define and implement innovative solutions for the product direction, visuals, and experience.
10. Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off.
11. Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps, to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas.
12. Create low-fidelity wireframes and quickly iterate based on feedback and synthesize multiple points of feedback into a thoughtful solution and response.
13. Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders.
14. Conduct user research, evaluate user feedback and execute on good user experience.
15. Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices, procedures, and standards.
Job Description:
1) Very strong knowledge in HTML, XHTML, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap. Demonstrable UIUX design skills Knowledge in Photoshop.
2) Knowledge of Web 2.0 design standards.
3) Experience in creating wire framing, storyboards, user flows & process flows.
4) Ability to successfully lead projects Up to date with the latest UIUX trends, techniques, and technologies.
5) Strong portfolio (please include a link or examples in job application).
6) Experience in responsive web designing and rich internet applications.
7) Experience in developing interactive web applications.
8) Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user - system interaction.
9) Ability to think critically, solve problems creatively and effectively.

Title: web designer front end developer jobs in Ahmedabad
Description:
We are looking for an outstanding Web Developer to be responsible for the coding, innovative design and layout of our website. Web developer responsibilities include building our website from concept all the way to completion from the bottom up, fashioning everything from the home page to site layout and function.
Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS
and SASS
Rock-solid understanding of JavaScript as we don't stick to any framework as such. Should be able to juggle between Angular, React, Electron, Flutter as in when needed.
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates,and AJAX.
Hands-on experience in optimizing the UI of an application.
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as Gimp or Photoshop is a plus.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.
